page.description: Specify the action to be performed when the user taps on the hyperlink. 'Telephone' and 'Email' use the 'tel' and 'mailto' protocols in the generated 'href' attribute to dial a phone number, or send an email with the associated telephone or mail client.

section.description: The Action type property has a number of options: Javascript, Href, Telephone, SMS, and Email

section.title: Email
section.description: You can configure a hyperlink control in a List control to open the associated e-mail client and fill in the 'to' address with a field.

To configure a hyperlink to open an e-mail client, set the 'Action type' to 'Email' and the 'Email address' to the value you want to put into the email client's 'to' address field. You can use placeholders in the 'Email address' property to refer to data in a field in the current row of the List.
